data.title: Kansas Bureau of Investigation
data.meta_description: Kansas Bureau of Investigation - Media Releases
data.text:
The Media releases are ordered by date of release. To access any listed media release, please click on the name of the media release and you wish to view. All Files are in PDF format and may require Adobe Acrobat Reader to view. You may download a free reader from Adobe's web site.

The Media may contact us at Media.Releases@kbi.state.ks.us to obtain sign up information to receive media releases via email.
